thumb.title: Real Estate Presentation Video
thumb.text: An informative presentation of the Real Estate company Park & Villas, created in PowerPoint.

page.title: Park & Villas
page.subTitle: Park & Villas â€“ Real Estate Construction Firm
page.text: This video is an informative presentation of the Real Estate company Park & Villas. It is prepared in PowerPoint and was presented during a music festival in Sweden on a large outdoor screen in order to promote one of their newest projects. In only a few seconds, the video shows information about the company and with a short text it describes the characteristics of their latest project. I also includes an invitation to their upcoming event. The presentation gives the viewer a feeling of green environments and a high standard living.
